hero.subtitle: Your bubble tea destination in Ghent!

about.intro: At Yibei Tea, we bring authentic bubbles, rich flavors and a warm, personal atmosphere to Sint-Niklaasstraat in the heart of Ghent. What once started as a small bubble tea shop has grown into a beloved place where visitors of all ages come together for a refreshing drink and a cozy moment.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is simple: making bubble tea the way it's meant to be. With real milk, powerful tea and soft tapioca pearls, inspired by the Asian origins of the drink. Where many shops choose gel toppings and hypes, we consciously stay true to authenticity and quality. That's why our classic bubble teas and milk teas take center stage, complemented by a wide range of iced coffees, especially for the coffee lovers in Ghent.
mission.growth: As the demand for bubble tea in Ghent continued to grow, we searched for a place where customers could not only pick up their orders, but also sit down, enjoy and meet each other. Today we welcome our guests in a cozy shop where experience and taste go hand in hand.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: We stay true to traditional Asian bubble tea culture, with pure flavors and recognizable textures.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We work with fresh ingredients: strong tea, creamy milk and perfectly prepared tapioca.

warmth.title: Warmth & connection
warmth.description: At Yibei Tea, it's not just about the drink, but about the moment. Enjoying together, catching up and slowing down.

story.label: Our Story
story.title: From Dream to Reality
story.description: Yibei Tea was founded by Naim, who saw how bubble tea had become incredibly popular in major cities across Europe. 'In big cities, people queue for bubble tea,' he noticed. Determined to bring this trend to Ghent, he opened the first authentic bubble tea bar on Brabantdam. Every drink is freshly prepared with premium ingredients, just like in the best bubble tea shops in Asia.
